snippet: Jeff Gordon crashed during the final practice before Sunday’s Nascar race at the Las Vegas Motor Speedway, where his pole-winning car was damaged enough that Hendrick Motorsports pulled out a backup Chevrolet.
abstract: Jeff Gordon is uninjured during crash at Las Vegas Motor Speedway, but will drop to rear of field at start of race because he changed cars.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon crashed during the final practice before Sunday’s Nascar race at the Las Vegas Motor Speedway, where his pole-winning car was damaged enough that Hendrick Motorsports pulled out a backup Chevrolet.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
